column12: Coordinates for capital city of Pataliputra (modern Patna)
Probably more general than Toba Batak (Ib4, xd753) but there should be overlap between them
Probably match to Seneca, based on references (Morgan 1901, Noon 1949)
Probably more general than Kwaio (Ig18, xd850) but there should be overlap between them
Guaraní in Paraguay, but not clear wheter closer to Paraguayan Guaraní (para1311) or Mbyá Guaraní (mbya1239)
Coordinates from glottolog chip1241, cross-id to Minnesota Ojibwa (EA Na36)
Not specified whether "Northwestern (xd783)" or "Southeastern (xd980)", but matched to EA - Tasmanians (Id8) (xd783)
The main source (Tom N. Headland) studied Casiguran Agta
